issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by the RefSeq for Cd1d2 (GeneID:12480, NM_007640.2), and the reference component to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: The frameshift in C57BL/6 is real, as published in PMID: 9531267. So this is a pseudogene in C57BL/6

issue.description: The is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by the RefSeq for Mcl1 (GeneID:17210, NM_008562.3) and the reference component to which it aligns,
issue.resolution_text: Single nucleotide error in reference component AC092479 confirmed, PCR FO082281(PCR_C57BL6_AC092479_1) has been inserted into the TPF to correct the error

issue.summary: WGS for proximal extension of Mm chr.3
issue.status_text: Due to lack of clone coverage for this region a hybridisation experiment has been requested to probe off the end of AC175117.

issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between AC175030.2 and the telomere
issue.resolution_text: AC225719 has been identified by Harold Reithman as an overlap for AC175030. AC225719 has approximately 300bp of Telomeric repeat on its end.

issue.summary: Should Mm37 unlocalized contig NT_166286 be retained in future assemblies?
issue.description: Determine evidence for retaining NT_166286 in future assemblies.
issue.resolution_text: AC175378 is redundant under overlapping Chr 5 clones AC125378 and AC109193 so is not required in the TPF

issue.summary: Possible single nucleotide error in reference component AC093317, chr 3 pos 95538799
issue.description: The reference sequence at position 95538799 of NC_000069.5 has been verified. Reported discrepancies at this site may reflect unrecognized variation or segmental duplication
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.resolution_text: Single nucleotide error in reference component AC093317 confirmed, PCR FQ790371(PCR_C57BL6J_AC093317_2) has been inserted into the TPF to correct the error.

issue.summary: Switchpoint for pair AC171110.2 and AC122831.2 has been curated due to a 1kb deletion in AC122831.2
issue.description: Switchpoint for pair AC171110.2 and AC122831.2 has been curated due to a 1kb deletion in AC122831.2
issue.resolution_text: Switchpoint for pair AC171110.2 and AC122831.2 has been curated due to a 1kb deletion in AC122831.2. The additional 1004bp of sequence contained within AC171110.2 is supported by Whole Genome Shotgun component CAAA0121491

issue.description: Switchpoint for pair AC073883.34 and AC158937.5 has been curated due to deletions of 977bp and 115bp in AC073883 relative to AC158937.
issue.resolution_text: Switchpoint for pair AC073883.34 and AC158937.5 has been curated due to deletions of 977bp and 115bp in AC073883 relative to AC158937.

issue.summary: Curate alignment for AC140372.3 and AC118206.11
issue.description: Alignments associated with AC140372.3 and AC118206.11 in the GRC database require curation.
issue.resolution_text: A single, preferred alignment for AC140372.3 and AC118206.11 has been updated to the GRC database. Switchpoints have been curated to match those in GRCm38 in order that the approved certificate is associated with the preferred alignment.

issue.summary: Consolidation needed for 3 NOD/MrkTac alt scaffolds?
issue.description: Should GRCm38 NOD/MrkTac alternate loci scaffolds GL456048.1/NT_039252.1, GL456045.2/NT_039247.2 and GL456049.2/NT_039257.4 be combined into a single scaffold?
issue.resolution_text: The submission of GL456048.1/NT_039252.1, GL456045.2/NT_039247.2 and GL456049.2/NT_039257.4 as three separate alternate loci scaffolds seems correct based on alignments.

issue.description: There is an assembly gap between AC171624.5 and AC160758.3, originally described in MG-3510. This duplicate Jira issue is being used to manage an update at this gap that is being considered for patch release.
issue.resolution_text: There is an assembly gap between AC171624.5 and AC160758.3, originally described in MG-3510. This duplicate Jira issue is being used to manage an update at this gap that is being considered for patch release.

issue.summary: There is an assembly gap between AC165416.12 and AC165333.4
issue.description: There is an assembly gap between AC165416.12 and AC165333.4, FO907134 extends ~6kb into this gap from the left, and this extension is being considered for a patch.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.status_text: 14-AUG-14: RP23-39E22 is in active finishing The region of AC173113 tagged as unresolved repeat (129483-145735 ) is being amplified in both C57BL/6J and 129/SvJ to determine if this region is variable between different strains. Accession for RP23-39E22: FO907125
issue.description: There are several discrepancies in the alignment of RefSeq NM_001013804.1 (Flg2) to the reference genome component AC173113.4; this may be due to inter-strain variation or repetitive sequence
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.status_text: Investigating OM data for this region
issue.description: Intu (GeneID:380614, NM_175515.4) may span the assembly gap between AC163023.4 and AC146980.9.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: Reference component AC135237.6 may be missing sequence, disrupting the alignment of H28 (GeneID:15061).
issue.resolution_text: The following C57BL/6J sequences have been found that support the reference genome over the region of NM_031367.1 that does not align in Build 37: AC123055.3 CAAA01021569.1 This evidence suggests that the differences in this region between the NM and the reference are as a result of inter-strain variation.
